item.title: BMW SKIN FOR SCANIA S NextGen TRUCK 1.35-1.51 ETS2
item.description:
BMW SKIN FOR SCANIA S NextGen TRUCK 1.35-1.51 ETS2

This mod include BMW Skin for SCANIA S NextGen TRUCK.
Works in ETS2 V 1.35- 1.51
Skin is only for SCANIA S NextGen TRUCK
Skin available on Base color option Metallic color option



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: New Tourismo 16 RHD – 2020 1.51 ETS2
item.description:
New Tourismo 16 RHD – 2020 1.51 ETS2

Added customizable license plate.
Front sliding sign added.
Chromium visual improvements have been made.
Added interior shadow that came with version 1.51x.
Engine sound has been changed.



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Man Lion’s Coach 2023 V1.2 1.51 ETS2
item.description:
Man Lion’s Coach 2023 V1.2 1.51 ETS2

v1.2 Updates;
Vehicles are operated in the shadow of the ground.
New system sliding sign added (indoor reflections active)
Added indoor shadow support with the new update
Rear towbar attachment added
Chrome lion pattern added to rear side windows
Chrome lion man pattern added to rear window
Updated color palette for interior passenger lights
Updated color palette and reflection in driver lighting
Added extra engine sound
Updated bellows sounds
Tachograph speed limit warning added (gives visual warning when 99 km/h is exceeded)



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: Kässbohrer K.SCD M by Sogard3 v1.0 1.51 ETS2
item.description:
Kässbohrer K.SCD M by Sogard3 v1.0 1.51 ETS2

Kässbohrer DLC Required!

Features:
– 3 axle chassis.
– Normal, TIR & Huckepack body.
– License plates.
– Custom rear mudflap.

The internal name for paintjobs is “kassbohrer.scd”.
Templates inside zip file.
Accessory list for paintjobs



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD

item.title: The Godfather’s Kenworth Trucks Skins Pack v2.3 ATS
item.description:
The Godfather’s Kenworth Trucks Skins Pack v2.3 ATS

The Godfather’s Kenworth Trucks Skins Pack

– The Godfather’s Mods Company brings to you this Kenworth Trucks Paintjob Pack that gives a whole heap of Real Company’s,Real Brands and much more over a whole range of Kenworth Trucks for American Truck Simulator both SCS Trucks & Modded Trucks the list of where to find the modded trucks are listed at the bottom and the list of what skins are in the pack and we will keep updating the pack when we can when new skins are ready to be added This is by farthe biggest Kenworth Paintjob pack in ATS so enjoy.

v1.7 Update (November 23rd 2023)
This Update brings 2 more Kenworth Trucks into the Paintjob Pack with our 1st wave of Paintjobs for the Kenworth K100 By Overfloater Mod Truck from Steam Workshop & the Kenworth T680 SCS Truck plus some new Paintjobs for the Kenworth SCS W900 Truck been added also this update makes the pack work with the 1.49x update to ATS..

v1.8 Update (January 2024)
This Update Brings a heap of new paintjobs also we add our 1st T680 Signature Edition (2022) Paintjobs with 6 Paintjobs added plus our 1st T359 Paintjobs for the pack with 2 paintjobs and the return of the Kenworth K200 Paintjobs with 5 Paintjobs Returning to the Pack and 24 brand new Paintjobs to bring the K200 Paintjobs to a total of 30 plus More paintjobs for other Kenworth Trucks see the list below for whats is new to the pack and Purple Rain Transport T909 Paintjob has been removed as the paintjob has got a new edition with the SWR Trailer’s paintjob pack 5.

v1.9 Update (March 2024)
This Update Brings A Heap of New Paintjobs for the Kenworth K200, T680 Signature Edition, SWR T608 plus our 1st wave of Kenworth T104 Paintjobs and also fixes Bugs and brings the pack up the games Virsion Number.

v2.0 Update (15th May 2024) 1.50x ATS Update
5Heaps of New Paintjobs with new Paintjobs for the Kenworth K200/T909/W990/K104/T950/LegendSAR & New Kenworth Paintjobs To the Pack 404SAR and the pack has been updated to work with the new 1.50x update to ATS

v2.1 Update (June 25th 2024) works with ATS 1.50x
This Update brings our next wave of new Kenworth Paintjobs with new skins for the T610 GTM,RTA K200,T104,SWR T909,SWR C509,SWR T950,SWR Legend Star,SWR T608 & W990 By Heaven with a total of 41 new Skins..

v2.2 Update (August 25th 2024)
This Update Brings our Next Wave of new Kenworth Trucks Paintjob skins with 40 new skins in total with new skins for the K200 RTA , T610 GTM , K104B , T909 , W900 SCS , C509 , T404SAR , T408 & Legend SAR do note that SWR Customs have just shut down for a while and the trucks still work fine in 1.50x of ATS if u have the trucks then keep them until they no good they still work fine just some shadow and light issues in day but lights work at night.

v2.3 Update (September 29th 2024)
This Update Brings all the T909 & T950 Skins over to the T908 RTA Mods Truck so no longer them skins are on them 2 kenworth trucks in the pack for now they will return in the next update know. plus this update brings a heap of other new Kenworth truck skins and updated for 1.51x of ATS.
SKINS THAT ARE IN THIS PACK AND WHAT KENWORTH THEY ARE FOR LISTED BELOW

All SWR Customs Trucks can no longer be founded as they have Shut Down for a while so skins in this pack are for people who still have the mods and using them do note sam will return one day but he has a young family so do understand he wants time with them..

RTA Mods Skins for the K200 & T908 in this pack are for people who own the Paid Mod Trucks that is your lucky to get them as they very hard to get in contact most of the time..
W990 Edited by Harven can be founded at Steam Workshop
Outlaws W900 Can be founded on his Website
K100 By Overfloater Can be Founded at Steam Workshop
W900 & T680 are SCS Trucks and are founded in game for ATS u will need a Mod edition of the SCS Trucks to work on ETS2..



How to install ETS2 mods or ATS Mods

In Euro Truck Simulator 2 it’s easy to install mods. You just need to download mod from here, copy/unzip files into: “My Documents\Euro Truck Simulator 2\mod” folder or if you play ATS please install mods to: “My Documents\American Truck Simulator\mod” folder. To unzip files you can use: WinRAR or 7zip. After that you need to activate the mods you want to use.




DOWNLOAD MOD
